localised_text.tooltip_text: Spectate||Watch the other player fight the battle. You cannot be gifted units as a spectator, you must be in support of defender or attacker in order to be gifted units.

seductive_influence_tracker.comment: Property setter is for handling sort, we do +1 so that those without resource at least sorted above those without resource

allies_combatants_panel.comment: This gets passed CcoCampaignCharacter from code (cco of the commander)

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Action Points||The green bar represents the remaining movement points this force has left. When the green bar is empty, the force will be unable to move until the next turn.

dy_units.componentleveltooltip: Number of units that can be seduced

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Entity & unit size||This is a unit of large entities.||This displays the current unit size compared to the maximum unit size. Units will replenish over time when in owned territory or certain stances.

autoresolve_visibility_parent.comment: This is parent that gets visibility toggled by dev ui button, so separate to dev ui parent whose visibility determined by if dev ui enabled or not

no_form.name: no_form
no_form.tooltip: [PH]No form equipped||Left click to open the Formless Horror panel

default.name: default
default.tooltip: This character is locked and untraceable. To unlock them, you must form an alliance with a faction of their culture. They may also be unlockable through certain schemes.
